fields.description: Name of the External Payroll Deduction.
Code of the External Payroll Deduction, which is also used as the unique identifier for the External Payroll Deduction for the reference ID type Deduction_Code.
A non unique external payroll code. You can only specify this field if the Enable External Payroll Code check box is selected on the Edit Tenant Setup - HCM task.
If true, the External Payroll Deduction is position-based.
ID of the Calculation Category. The value is always Outbound Payroll Interface.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group(s) for which the External Payroll Deduction is relevant. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
ID of the Allowed Payroll Input Type(s). Specify either the WID or "Payroll_Input_Type_Id=12345". Allowed Payroll Input Types include Adjustment, Goal Amount, Input, and Ongoing.

Specify Benefit Plans when the External Payroll Deduction applies to a benefit plan. Specify either the WID or the relevant Reference ID. Examples: Additional_Benefits_Plan_ID, Defined_Contribution_Plan_ID, Health_Care_Coverage_Plan_ID, Health_Savings_Account_Plan_ID, Insurance_Coverage_Plan_ID, Spending_Account_Plan_ID.
Specify the Time Off instance when the External Payroll Deduction is for paid time off. Specify either the WID or "Absence_Component_Related_Calculation_ID=12345".
The order of the criteria used for scheduling.
Contains the scheduling criteria calculation data.
If true, the web service excludes the External Payroll Deduction from outbound Payroll Interface integrations.
Comments regarding the External Payroll Deduction.
ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".. Supports multiple values.
ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".. Supports multiple values.

Absence_Calculation_Reference.description: Specify the Time Off instance when the External Payroll Deduction is for paid time off. Specify either the WID or "Absence_Component_Related_Calculation_ID=12345".

Benefit_Plan_Reference.description: Specify Benefit Plans when the External Payroll Deduction applies to a benefit plan. Specify either the WID or the relevant Reference ID. Examples: Additional_Benefits_Plan_ID, Defined_Contribution_Plan_ID, Health_Care_Coverage_Plan_ID, Health_Savings_Account_Plan_ID, Insurance_Coverage_Plan_ID, Spending_Account_Plan_ID.

Calculation_Category_Reference.description: ID of the Calculation Category. The value is always Outbound Payroll Interface.

Code.description: Code of the External Payroll Deduction, which is also used as the unique identifier for the External Payroll Deduction for the reference ID type Deduction_Code.

Comments.description: Comments regarding the External Payroll Deduction.

External_Payroll_Code.description: A non unique external payroll code. You can only specify this field if the Enable External Payroll Code check box is selected on the Edit Tenant Setup - HCM task.

Frequency_Reference_Frequency_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Frequency_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Group_Reference_Pay_Component_Group_Code.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Group_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Inbound_Only.description: If true, the web service excludes the External Payroll Deduction from outbound Payroll Interface integrations.

Name.description: Name of the External Payroll Deduction.

Order.description: The order of the criteria used for scheduling.

Outbound_Pay_Component_Group_Reference_P.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Pay_Group_Reference.description: ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group(s) for which the External Payroll Deduction is relevant. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".

Pay_Groups_for_Payroll_Interface_Referen.description: ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".. Supports multiple values.
ID of the Third-Party Payroll Pay Group. Specify either the WID or "Organization_Reference_ID=12345".. Supports multiple values.

Payroll_Input_Type_Reference.description: ID of the Allowed Payroll Input Type(s). Specify either the WID or "Payroll_Input_Type_Id=12345". Allowed Payroll Input Types include Adjustment, Goal Amount, Input, and Ongoing.

Position_Based.description: If true, the External Payroll Deduction is position-based.

Scheduling_Calculation.description: Contains the scheduling criteria calculation data.
